{"label":"Get Class API","category":"DataFlow_TrigComponent","size":"270 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Update","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"show","value":"public","unit":"","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

const show = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'show', 'public,private' );
let result = '';
// Get input link list
const inLinkDataList = graphData.dfe.getInputLinkDataList( nodeData, 'in' );
// If Input is connected
if( inLinkDataList && inLinkDataList.length ) {
  // Loop over in components
  for( const inLinkData of inLinkDataList ) {
    const inNodeKey = inLinkData.from;
    
    // Read data of fanIn components
    const inNodeData = getNodeData( inNodeKey );
    if( inNodeData && inNodeData.isFile ) {
      if( inNodeData.fileContent ) {
        const api = getAPI( inNodeData.fileContent );
        result = result+api;
      } else if( inNodeData.fileURL ) {
        loadNodeContent( inNodeData, (s)=>{
          result = result+getAPI( s );
          graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', result );
        });
      }
    }
  }
}

graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', result );

function getAPI( source, show ) {
  let result = '';
  if( source ) {
    // This regexp matches any function definition at the beginning of any line
    //const expr = new RegExp( /\nfunction\s+(?<api>\w+\([^\)]*\))/g );
    const expr = new RegExp( /\n\s\s(?<api>\w+\([^\)]*\))\s+\{/g );
    const match = ('\n'+source).matchAll( expr );
    const matchList = Array.from( match, (m)=> m.groups.api );
    result = result+matchList.join( '\n' );
  }
  return( result );
}","fileTypeName":"Component","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":37,"location":"22760 -4330","editorPosition":[787,1092,703,895]},

{"label":"     agent 
creation task","category":"DataFlow_Data","size":"240 80","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a string"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a string"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"Your goal is to generate different caracteristics of 
an agent that will be involved in discussion and making 
of recipes. Based on a short specification you have to 
generate a JSON object containig the following keys:
{
  "name": <string>,
  "social memories": [<array of strings>], 
  "intolerances": [<array of strings>], 
  "preferences": [<array of strings>], 
  "capabilities": [<array of strings>], 
  "personality": [<array of strings>]
}
Here is the description of the kind of information 
you have to generate for each of these keys:
* "name": the agent name
* "social memories": invented facts that can be used 
   by the agent to produce small talk like:
   - family and friends
   - current events and news
   - interest and hobbies
   - recent personal events
* "intolerances": invented facts that can be used 
   by the agent to inform others in a discussion about
   food restrictions like:
   - food sickness (diabetes, fat)
   - allergies (gluten, nuts,...)
* "preferences": invented facts that can be used 
   by the agent to inform others in a discussion about
   what the agent likes or dislike, such as:
   - hobbies
   - special interest
   - loved or hated food ingredients
* "capabilities": invented facts that can be used 
   by the agent to inform others in a discussion about
   what the agent is, can or cannot do, such as:
   - age range (child, adult,...)
   - motor disabilities if any (broken arm)
   - perceptive disabilities if any (blind)
   - cognitive disabilities if any (Alzheimer)
   - skills (amateur or profi cook)
* "personality": invented facts that can be used 
   by the agent to influence the way the agent speaks or 
   behave, such as:
   - responsiveness (speed of reaction, initiative, 
     proactiveness, engagement)
   - verbal style (formality, verbosity)
   - emotionality (excitement, empathy, aggressively, ...)

All caracteristics that are not defined in the short 
specification have to be invented.","fileTypeName":"Text","fileType":"text/text","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/Text_Data.png","doCompute":"DataFlow_Data","key":221,"location":"13040 180","editorPosition":[-6047,375,622,756]},

    "discussion": "Alex, Bob, and Alice introduce themselves and discuss what kind of food they would like to prepare together. They can share their preferences and ideas for the meal.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they have agreed on a general plan for the meal",
    "identity traits": ["personality", "preferences"]
  },
  "2": {
    "goal": "Check the available ingredients",
    "discussion": "Alex and the others check the ingredients available on the table or in the apartment to see what they can use for the meal. They can discuss the options and consider any allergies or food intolerances they have.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they have assessed the available ingredients and decided on a recipe",
    "identity traits": ["intolerances", "environment-state"]
  },
  "3": {
    "goal": "Assign tasks and start the cooking process",
    "discussion": "Alex, Bob, and Alice assign tasks to each other based on their capabilities and preferences. They discuss the steps required to prepare the chosen recipe and begin the cooking process.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they have assigned tasks and started cooking",
    "identity traits": ["capabilities"]
  },
  "4": {
    "goal": "Continuing the cooking process",
    "discussion": "Alex, Bob, and Alice continue cooking the dish, following the recipe and supporting each other with any questions or help needed.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they have completed the cooking process and the dish is ready",
    "identity traits": []
  },
  "5": {
    "goal": "Enjoy the meal and have a conversation",
    "discussion": "Alex, Bob, and Alice sit down to enjoy the meal they prepared together. They can engage in a casual conversation, sharing stories, and getting to know each other better.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they finish eating and decide it's time to wrap up the evening",
    "identity traits": ["social memories"]
  },
  "6": {
    "goal": "Wrap up and say goodbye",
    "discussion": "Alex, Bob, and Alice clean up the kitchen, store any leftovers, and say goodbye to each other. They can discuss future plans or exchange contact information if desired.",
    "switchCondition": "Once they have finished cleaning and preparing to leave",
    "identity traits": ["personality"]
  }

creation task","category":"DataFlow_Data","size":"240 80","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a string"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a string"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"Your goal is to generate a high level plan to describe 
the activities a group of agents have to do together.
Based on a short specification you have to 
generate a JSON object containig a series of steps 
like this:
{
  "1": {
    "goal": <string>,
    "discussion": <string>,
    "switchCondition": <string>,
    "identity traits": [<array of strings>] 
  }
  "2": {
    "goal": <string >,
    "discussion": <string>,
    "switchCondition": <string>,
    "identity traits": [<array of strings>]
  }
  ...
}
Here is the description of the kind of information 
you have to generate for each of these keys:
* "goal": a string describing the goal of the current step
* "discussion": a string describing the discusion elements that
  should be addressed and the action that should be performed. 
  that the agents should discuss in the current step
* "switchCondition": a string describing the criteria that should 
  trigger a switch to the next step in the dialog. These criteria 
  must be concrete and easy to detect from the dialog. 
* "identity traits": an array of strings that describes 
  for the current step, the traits of the agent identity 
  that needs to be considered. the identity traits must 
  be taken from the following list:
  - "personality": individual character that distinguish 
    agent from each other, 
  - "social memories": events and facts that can be used 
    to untertain a discussion,
  - "preferences": individual specific likes and dislikes, 
  - "intolerances": allergies and health related 
    food restrictions, 
  - capabilities: agent skills and physical and mental 
    abilities,
  - environment-state: description of objects, ingredients 
    and tools available in the surounding of the agent.","fileTypeName":"Text","fileType":"text/text","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/Text_Data.png","doCompute":"DataFlow_Data","key":202,"location":"12890 1289.0519999999997","group":207,"editorPosition":[-1881,105,468,640]},

input names that will trigger an 
"doCompute" call in the component","value":"identity","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'doCompute' ) {
  const identity = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'identity', {} );
  const currentStepInfo = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'currentStepInfo', {} );
  const traits = currentStepInfo['identity traits'];
  
  const outValue = {};
  if( traits ) {
    traits.forEach( (t)=> outValue[t] = identity[t] );
  }
  graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );

{"label":"current identity traits","category":"DataFlow_Data","size":"200 80","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a string"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a string"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"{

{"label":"master plan
 sequencer","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"reset","name":"reset"},{"portId":"masterPlan","name":"masterPlan"},{"portId":"switchState","name":"switchState"}],"out_":[{"portId":"currentStepInfo","name":"currentStepInfo"},{"portId":"nextStepInfo","name":"nextStepInfo"},{"portId":"doStop","name":"doStop"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"maxContinue","value":"10","unit":"","valueChanged":true}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'reset' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'index', 0 );
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'turnCount', 0 );
}

if( name == 'switchState' ) {
  let index = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'index', 0 );
  const masterPlan = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'masterPlan', {} );
  const maxContinue = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'maxContinue', 10 );
  
  // Force switch after maxContinue number of turn
  let turnCount = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'turnCount', 0 );
  if( turnCount >= maxContinue ) {
    graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'turnCount', 0 );
    value = 'switch';
  } else {
    graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'turnCount', turnCount+1 );
  }
  
  // Test decision to switch to the next state
  if( value.includes( 'switch' ) ) {
    ++index;
    graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'index', index );
    // Get current step
    const stepInfo = masterPlan[index];
    
    // Trigger state info
    if( stepInfo ) {
      graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'currentStepInfo', stepInfo );
      let nextStepInfo = masterPlan[index];
      if( !nextStepInfo ) {
        nextStepInfo = {};
      }
      graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'nextStepInfo', nextStepInfo );
    } else {
      graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'doStop' );
    }
  }
}","fileTypeName":"Component","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":236,"location":"1012.8960000000006 -7392.545","editorPosition":[428,502,584,527],"group":291},

{"label":"    system prompt","category":"DataFlow_Data","size":"240 80","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a string"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a string"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"Your role is to be a moderator of a discussion.
You receive the following information:
1) the current goal, a short description of the 
   current discussion topic and switch condition criteria.
2) the next goal, a short description of the
   next discussion topic and switch condition criteria.
3) the history of the current discussion.

Your goal is to let the discusion go until you
think the current goal has been achieved by cheking if 
the switch condition criteria are met.
As long as the criteria are not met you must generate 
the command: 
   "continue with current goal"
   
This will give time to the actor to elaborate 
on the goal. 
Once you feel the goal has been achieved because the 
switch condition criteria are met, then you must
generate the command:
   "switch to next goal"","fileTypeName":"Text","fileType":"text/text","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/Text_Data.png","doCompute":"DataFlow_Data","key":272,"location":"2257.7239999999983 -7578.022999999999","group":311,"editorPosition":[1847,1538,400,350]},

{"label":"Convert Assistant to Chat","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"sender","name":"sender"},{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"defaultSender","value":"Alice","unit":"","valueChanged":true}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'in' ) {
  let result = {};
  const defaultSender = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'defaultSender', '' );
  let sender = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'sender', defaultSender );
  const match = value.match( /\[(?<sender>\w+)\s+\->\s+(?<receiver>\w+)\]\s+(?<text>.*)/ );
  if( match ) {
    const item = match.groups;
    sender = sender || item.sender;
    result = { sender, receiver: item.receiver, text: item.text };
  } else {
    result = { sender, receiver: 'All', text: value };
  }
  graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', result );
}

{"label":"AI template","category":"DataFlow_Template","size":"240 190","color":"Moccasin","in_":[{"portId":"agentName","name":"agentName"},{"portId":"currentIdentity","name":"currentIdentity"},{"portId":"other1","name":"other1"},{"portId":"other2","name":"other2"},{"portId":"situation","name":"situation"},{"portId":"currentStepInfo","name":"currentStepInfo"},{"portId":"factList","name":"factList"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"currentIdentity","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"matcher","value":"{[^}]+}"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"This is the history of conversation until now
from the oldest to the earliest turns (empty at start):
{factList}

Take the role of an agent named {agentName}. 
your personality traits are defined in the 
following JSON:
{currentIdentity}

You are in the following situation:
{situation}

Your goal is defined in the following JSON
by the fields "goal" and "discussion":
{currentStepInfo}

Nevertheless the goal is abstract and defined in meta-terms.
You have to convert this goal in concrete action and concrete
proposals rooted in reality.
Give the most probable reaction of {agentName} to the 
current conversation by considering the goal but also 
by answering questions raised during the conversation.
Produce a single sentence with {agentName} as a sender. 
Your answer must be in the following format 
using one and only one of the following options:
a) if you want to say something to All: 
   [{agentName} -> All] <your sentence, question or answer>
b) if you want to ask something to Alex:
   [{agentName} -> {other1}] <your question or answer to Alex>
c) if you want to ask something to Bob:
   [{agentName} -> {other2}] <your question or answer to Bob>
b) if you don't want to say anything (be silent): 
   [{agentName} -> All] (silence)
   
To produce the most probable answer to the discussion 
you must respect the following rules.
1) Be extremely concise, use a single sentence.
2) Be casual and avoid formalities and never repeat "thanks".
4) Do not repeat any information already present in 
the history of the discussion said by you or others.
5) Be concrete in the proposal you make.
6) Answer questions immediately and never repeat the question. 
or example you can approve a suggestion or propose 
something else. Important is to have every question 
answered immediately to progress with the dialog.
7) Formulate the actions you do so that the other 
participants can be informed.
8) Try to reach the goal as quick as possible.","fileTypeName":"Template","doCompute":"DataFlow_Template","key":322,"location":"2610.5 -8389.945","editorPosition":[953,903,400,350],"group":295},

{"label":"Next Speaker Selection","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"Alex","name":"Alex"},{"portId":"Bob","name":"Bob"},{"portId":"Alice","name":"Alice"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

// const sender = value.sender;
// const receiver = value.receiver;

//const nextSpeaker = getNextSpeaker( sender, receiver );
const nextSpeaker = getNextSpeaker( value );
// graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'nextSpeaker', nextSpeaker );
graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, nextSpeaker, nextSpeaker );
// graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', value );


function getNextSpeaker( msgInfo ) {
  let nextActor = '';
  const actors = graphData.dfe.getOutputNameList( nodeData );
  // const actorList = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'actorList', '[]' );
  // const actors = jsyaml.load( actorList );
  const filterActor = actors.filter( (n)=> !n.endsWith( msgInfo.sender ) );
  
  // Select next actor
  if( msgInfo.receiver == 'All' ) {
    nextActor = guessNextActor( filterActor, msgInfo.text ) ||
                selectRandomActor( filterActor );
  } else {
    nextActor = msgInfo.receiver;
  }

  return( nextActor );
}
function guessNextActor( filterActor, text ) {
  let nextActor = '';
  
  let actorIdx = -1;
  filterActor.forEach( (n)=> { 
    const idx = text.lastIndexOf( n ) 
    if( idx > actorIdx ) {
      nextActor = n;
    }
  });
  
  return( nextActor );
}
function selectRandomActor( filterActor ) {
  // Select a random index for the remaining actors
  const idx = Math.floor( Math.random()*filterActor.length );
  return( filterActor[idx] );
}

const actorList = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'actorList', '[]' );

[Bob -> All] I'm looking forward to adding a touch of fresh basil from my garden to whatever Italian dish we decide on—any preferences or dietary restrictions I should be aware of?
[Alex -> All] Hold on... Your idea of adding fresh basil sounds delightful, Bob; shall we consider making a classic Margherita pizza?

Take the role of an agent named Bob. 
your personality traits are defined in the 
following JSON:
{
  "personality": [
    "Bob is a proactive agent who takes initiative in discussions.",
    "Bob tends to speak in a concise and formal manner.",
    "Bob is empathetic and shows genuine interest in others' opinions.",
    "Bob maintains a calm and composed demeanor in all situations."
  ],
  "preferences": [
    "Bob loves cooking Italian cuisine.",
    "Bob is a passionate gardener and loves using fresh herbs in his recipes.",
    "Bob dislikes spicy food.",
    "Bob enjoys experimenting with new flavors and ingredients."
  ],
  "intolerances": [
    "Bob is lactose intolerant.",
    "Bob has a gluten intolerance.",
    "Bob is allergic to shellfish."
  ]
}

You are in the following situation:
Alex (a robot) has invited Bob (a male human) 
and Alice (a female human) to his home to 
prepare food together and enjoy the evening


Your goal is defined in the following JSON
by the fields "goal" and "discussion":
{
  "goal": "Introductions and Setting the Mood",
  "discussion": "The agents introduce themselves and have some small talk",
  "switchCondition": "Once introductions have been made and some general topics have been discussed.",
  "identity traits": [
    "personality",
    "preferences",
    "intolerances"
  ]
}

Nevertheless the goal is abstract and defined in meta-terms.
You have to convert this goal in concrete action and concrete
proposals rooted in reality.
Give the most probable reaction of Bob to the 
current conversation by considering the goal but also 
by answering questions raised during the conversation.
Produce a single sentence with Bob as a sender. 
Your answer must be in the following format 
using one and only one of the following options:
a) if you want to say something to All: 
   [Bob -> All] <your sentence, question or answer>
b) if you want to ask something to Alex:
   [Bob -> Alex] <your question or answer to Alex>
c) if you want to ask something to Bob:
   [Bob -> Bob] <your question or answer to Bob>
b) if you don't want to say anything (be silent): 
   [Bob -> All] (silence)
   
To produce the most probable answer to the discussion 
you must respect the following rules.
1) Be extremely concise, use a single sentence.
2) Be casual and avoid formalities and never repeat "thanks".
4) Do not repeat any information already present in 
the history of the discussion said by you or others.
5) Be concrete in the proposal you make.
6) Answer questions immediately and never repeat the question. 
or example you can approve a suggestion or propose 
something else. Important is to have every question 
answered immediately to progress with the dialog.
7) Formulate the actions you do so that the other 
participants can be informed.

{"label":"History1","category":"DataFlow_DataSend","size":"240 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Restore","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a JSON object or array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a JSON object or array"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"[
  {
    "text": "Have you ever been to Alex's home before?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "No, it's my first time visiting Alex's home.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Great, I'm excited for you both to experience my home for the first time! Let's proceed to my place.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I hope you'll enjoy the food we prepare together tonight!\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm excited to try out the food you both prepare tonight!\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Do you have any dietary preferences or intolerances that we should consider when deciding on the type of food to prepare?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"As a robot, I don't have any dietary preferences or intolerances, so feel free to suggest any type of food you'd like to make.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I have lactose intolerance and gluten intolerance, so we should keep that in mind when deciding on the type of food to prepare.\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Since I have lactose and gluten intolerance, it would be great if we could consider some lactose-free and gluten-free options for the food tonight.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Since Bob has lactose and gluten intolerances, let's focus on finding recipes that are lactose-free and gluten-free.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I can come up with some delicious lactose-free and gluten-free Italian recipes for us to prepare tonight!\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I can suggest a lactose-free and gluten-free dessert that we can make together. How does that sound?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"That sounds like a great plan! Let's start looking for some delicious lactose-free and gluten-free Italian recipes and a lactose-free and gluten-free dessert for tonight.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm glad we're all on the same page about focusing on lactose-free and gluten-free options. Let's start searching for recipe ideas!\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I found some delicious lactose-free and gluten-free Italian recipes and a lactose-free and gluten-free dessert. Let's get started on cooking!\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm glad we found some delicious recipes. Let's divide the tasks to get started on cooking!\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm excited to start cooking! What tasks do you think we should each take on?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I suggest we start by assigning tasks based on our capabilities and make a plan for coordinating the cooking process.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Based on our capabilities, I can handle identifying and preparing the ingredients, Alice can assist with the cooking process, and Bob can focus on coordinating and overseeing the tasks. Does that sound good?\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm excited to assist with the cooking process and help prepare the delicious lactose-free and gluten-free Italian recipes and dessert!\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"That sounds like a good plan! Let's get started with the assigned tasks and coordinate the cooking process.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  }
]","fileTypeName":"JSON","fileType":"text/json","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/JSON_Data.png","key":323,"location":"26340 -4980","doCompute":"DataFlow_DataSend","editorPosition":[1454,90,778,911]},

Also if an input is connected"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'doCompute' ) {
  const database = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'array', [] );
  const indexInput = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'index', -1 );
  const dblen = database.length;
  
  if( dblen > 0 ) {
    
    const isIndexRandom = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'isIndexRandom', false );
    let index = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'index', 0 );
    index = ( indexInput == -1 )? index: indexInput;
    
    if( isIndexRandom ) {
      index = Math.floor( Math.random()*dblen );
    }
    
    index = Math.min( dblen-1, Math.max( 0, index ) );
    const outValue = database[index];
    
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
  }
}","fileTypeName":"GetFromArray","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":330,"location":"14860 1362.6769999999997","group":207},

{"label":"Stop Gate","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"reset","name":"reset"},{"portId":"in","name":"in"},{"portId":"trigger","name":"trigger"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"isPropagateOnTrigger","value":"false","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

const isPropagateOnTrigger = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'isPropagateOnTrigger', true );
if( name == 'reset' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', false );
} else if( name == 'in' ) {
  const isTriggerReceived = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', false );
  if( !isTriggerReceived && !isPropagateOnTrigger ) {
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', value );
  }
} else if( name == 'trigger' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', true );
  const outValue = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'in', null );
  if( isPropagateOnTrigger ) {
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
  }
}","fileTypeName":"Gate","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":338,"location":"7750.5 -7479.945","editorPosition":[1388,814,735,342],"group":584},

{"label":"History","category":"DataFlow_DataSend","size":"240 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Restore","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a JSON object or array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a JSON object or array"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"[
  {
    "text": "Hey Bob and Alice, I'm excited to have you both over at my place to prepare food together and enjoy the evening. Let's get started with some cooking!",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Hey Alex, thanks for inviting us! I'm really looking forward to cooking together and getting to know each other. What are we going to prepare?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Hey Alice and Bob, I'm really excited to have you both over! Let's discuss different cuisines and decide on the type of food we want to prepare together.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I can draw and help with the decorations for the evening, what can I do to help with the cooking?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"To start off, let's check the availability of ingredients. Bob and Alice, can you let me know what ingredients you have on hand?\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I have some fruits and vegetables, so maybe I can help with chopping and preparing the ingredients.\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I can help with checking the availability of ingredients by looking through my collection of rare cookbooks.\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Great! You can help with chopping and preparing the ingredients while I find a recipe based on the ingredients we have.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Since I enjoy baking and have some fruits, how about we make a fruit tart for dessert?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"That's a great idea, Alice! Let's make a fruit tart for dessert. Bob, could you find a recipe for a delicious fruit tart that we can make with the available ingredients?\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Since we have fruits and vegetables, I can help with chopping and preparing the ingredients for the fruit tart.\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Could you find a recipe for a fruit tart using the available ingredients?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Sure, I can find a recipe for a fruit tart using the available ingredients. I'll start searching through my collection of rare cookbooks.\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Great! Alice, you can start chopping and preparing the ingredients for the fruit tart while Bob searches for a recipe. Let's get started!\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I'm done chopping and preparing the ingredients for the fruit tart. What's next?\"",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Do we have any cream for the fruit tart?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Bob, could you please search for any cream we have for the fruit tart?\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Where would you like me to search for the cream?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I found some cream in the refrigerator, we can use that for the fruit tart.\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Can I help with anything else in the kitchen?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Could you please check if we have any other ingredients besides the cream for the fruit tart?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Should I start preparing the dough for the fruit tart now?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Could you start preparing the dough for the fruit tart now?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"I have found a recipe for a delicious fruit tart using the available ingredients. Let's use the cream Bob found in the refrigerator and Alice can start preparing the dough for the fruit tart.\"",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Can I help with anything else in the kitchen?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "\"Great progress! Alice, please start working on rolling out the dough for the fruit tart.\"",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Could you please start preheating the oven for the fruit tart?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  }
]","fileTypeName":"JSON","fileType":"text/json","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/JSON_Data.png","key":336,"location":"26340 -4800","doCompute":"DataFlow_DataSend"},
{"label":"Clear Label of Message Nodes","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[],"props_":[{"name":"isLocal","value":"true","unit":"","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

// Test if clean only local group labels:
// - isLocal = true => clean only labels in the group we are in
// - isLocal = false => clean all labels that are in any group
const isLocal = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'isLocal', false );
// Group test function
const testGroup = (g)=> ( isLocal? g == nodeData.group: g != undefined );

// Get all message nodes (except big plan)
const dataList = graphData.dfe.me.getNodeListIf( graphData.dfe.me.modelId, 
                                           (d)=> d.category.endsWith( 'Flow_Message' ) &&
                                           testGroup( d.group ) );
for( const data of dataList ) {
  setNodeDataField( data.key, 'label', '' );
}","fileTypeName":"Clear Labels","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":341,"location":"660.5 -9179.945","editorPosition":[564,1974,693,325],"group":584},

{"label":"Convert message to String","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"260 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","valueChanged":true}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

let response = '';
if( Array.isArray( value ) ) {
  const responseList = [];
  value.forEach( (msg)=> {
    responseList.push( getMessageToString( msg ) );
  }); 
  response = responseList.join( '\n' );
} else {
  response = getMessageToString( value );
}
graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', response );

function getMessageToString( msg ) {
  return( `[${msg.sender} -> ${msg.receiver}] ${msg.text}` );
}","fileTypeName":"Component","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":356,"location":"6220.5 -7610.045","group":470},
{"label":"History","category":"DataFlow_DataSend","size":"240 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Restore","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a JSON object or array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a JSON object or array"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"[
  {
    "text": "(silence)",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Since we're all here for a delightful evening, I'm keen to suggest we make a classic Italian pizza together, what do you think?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "A classic Italian pizza sounds marvelous, Bob; I'm in, and just a heads up, I'm not great with spicy toppings!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'm thinking of making a Margherita pizza—how does that sound, keeping it simple and classic for us?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Margherita sounds perfect, and maybe we can add some chocolate dessert at the end?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "A touch of homemade basil from my garden would be a delightful addition to our Margherita pizza, and for dessert, how about we try making a batch of classic chocolate truffles?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Those chocolate truffles sound decadent, Bob, and I'm also curious—Alex, since you're our host, do you have any favorite dishes you'd like to share with us?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex, do you fancy a specific theme for tonight's setting, perhaps some Italian music to complement our meal preparation?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "The Margherita pizza and classic chocolate truffles sound delightful; I'll set the table with some tech-inspired decor and play Vivaldi to complement our Italian theme, shall we?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Vivaldi's melodies will pair wonderfully with our Italian night—shall we start with the pizza dough?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Before we begin, do we have flour, yeast, olive oil, tomatoes, mozzarella, and my fresh basil for the pizza and cream, dark chocolate, and cocoa powder for the truffles?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Got the flour, yeast, and olive oil; who can bring the tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "(silence)",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I can swing by the market for the tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil—Alex, could you check if you've got cream and dark chocolate stashed somewhere for the truffles?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "No worries, Bob, I've got cream and dark chocolate in the pantry for our truffles.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Great, Alex, could you please set out the cream and dark chocolate on the counter so we can start with the truffles as the dough rises?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Cream and dark chocolate are ready on the counter, and I'll check for cocoa powder now; do we need anything else for the truffles?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex, do we have any cocoa powder or an alternative like instant espresso that could give our truffles a distinct flavor twist?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "I found the cocoa powder for the truffles, and since we're avoiding spicy, perhaps we can use the instant espresso as a less intense but flavorful twist?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "With cocoa powder and instant espresso at hand, we've got all we need for unique truffles; shall we preheat the oven for the pizza dough next?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll preheat the oven to 475°F for the pizza dough while we begin assembling the truffles.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "While the oven heats up, let's start by mixing the truffle ingredients – Alice, could you please combine the heavy cream and chopped dark chocolate and heat them gently?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll start by gently heating the cream and adding the chopped chocolate to make a smooth mixture for our truffles.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, as you handle the chocolate and cream fusion, I'm setting up the dough station with our ingredients – let's synchronize so that the dough can rest while we shape the truffles.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, while you and Alex handle the truffle mixture, I'll start preparing the pizza dough on the side.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex, could you grab some olive oil and salt for the dough, and Alice, once the truffle mixture is smooth, could you chill it in the fridge so we can start shaping them in a bit?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The truffle mixture is now chilling; let's get the pizza dough started, can you guide me through the steps?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Absolutely, Alice, let's start with the pizza dough by mixing the flour, yeast, a pinch of salt, some olive oil, and warm water until it forms a soft, pliable ball.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Okay, I'll mix the dough ingredients in a large bowl until it's ready for kneading.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Great work, Alice, once you've finished kneading the dough, could you let it rest covered for about half an hour while we shape the truffles?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "The dough is now resting, so let's start shaping the truffles; could you show me how to do it?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Sure Alice, to shape the truffles, we'll use a melon baller or a teaspoon to scoop chilled chocolate mixture, then quickly roll it into balls with our hands before dusting them with cocoa powder or dipping them in melted chocolate.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've rolled the truffles in cocoa and they're set to chill; should we check on the dough's rise or prep the toppings next?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Great, let's check the dough's rise and if it's doubled in size, we can start prepping our toppings – slicing the mozzarella and picking fresh basil leaves.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The dough has definitely doubled, so I'll start slicing the mozzarella while you could pick the basil leaves, Bob.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, that's perfect; I'm picking the basil now, and then let's assemble our pizza toppings before we bake it.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "While I slice the mozzarella, who wants to spread the sauce on the dough?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll spread the sauce on the dough and get it ready for the toppings, so we're all set to bake.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "As the sauce settles on the dough, I can't wait to taste our creation—shall we bake the pizza first, then enjoy the truffles after?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Let's bake the pizza, and once it's delightfully golden, we'll sit down and savor every bite before indulging in the truffles for a sweet finale.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The aroma is inviting, and everything looks delicious; let's dig in and enjoy our handmade feast!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Tonight's culinary adventure was quite exquisite, how about we plan a future evening focused on plant-based delicacies inspired by the botanical garden visit I mentioned earlier?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The evening was splendid; how about we gather for a vegan cooking night next time, perhaps experimenting with some recipes inspired by the botanical garden's plants?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Pondering our culinary exploration, a vegan cook-off next round—imagine the dishes we could craft with those incredible botanicals!",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Let's set a date for that vegan cook-off; I'm eager to experiment with what we can create from the inspiration at the botanical garden!",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  }

{"label":"Send Goal Message","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"*"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'in' ) {
  const lastGoal = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'lastGoal', null );

  if( lastGoal != goal ) {
    graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'lastGoal', goal );

      text: `Lets change our topic and discuss about ${goal}`,
    }
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
    
  }

{"label":"History","category":"DataFlow_DataSend","size":"240 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Restore","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a JSON object or array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a JSON object or array"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"[
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about introductions and setting the mood",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Good evening, Bob and Alice, it's wonderful to have you here; may I ask if either of you have any dietary restrictions or preferences to consider for tonight's menu?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Oh, I'm always up for trying out new recipes, just nothing too spicy for me, and perhaps we could make something with chocolate for dessert?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, any food preferences or restrictions we should know about before we start planning our feast?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "I prefer Italian dishes with fresh herbs and would love to contribute to that aspect of tonight's meal, avoiding spicy elements, of course.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "How does a homemade Italian herb-infused pizza with a side of chocolate gelato sound to everyone for tonight's meal?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "That sounds fantastic, and I can definitely help with the chocolate gelato!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Let's set the mood with some Italian music in the background to complement our culinary theme, shall we?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about recipe selection",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll start on the chocolate gelato, and I have a great recipe for a basil pesto sauce for our pizza if that fits into our Italian theme!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about ingredient check",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Before we dive in, can we do a quick ingredient check to make sure we have everything for the pizza and gelato, and figure out any alternatives if needed?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll grab the basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, and olive oil for the pesto, but do we have enough flour and yeast for the pizza dough?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've got the fresh herbs covered and plenty of garlic; just need to check, do we have tomatoes and mozzarella for the pizza topping?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll go check the pantry for flour and yeast, and yes, we have plenty of both for our pizza dough!",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll double-check the pantry for chocolate, but can someone confirm if we have enough sugar and cream for the gelato?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Can someone check if we have sugar and cream in the fridge for the gelato, and I'll see if there's chocolate in the pantry.",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've got the chocolate; we're just missing the cream for the gelato, any ideas for alternatives or should we run to the store?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "How about using coconut milk as a creamy base for our gelato instead of cream, which could add an interesting twist to our dessert?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Coconut milk sounds like a delicious alternative for the gelato, let's use that!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about preparation and cooking",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll whip up a fresh marinara with the tomatoes and garlic, and anyone up for hand-stretching the pizza dough with me?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, could I help you with the marinara sauce or with stretching the pizza dough?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, that'd be great—let's start with the marinara sauce, and we can team up on the dough afterward!",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Let's get cracking on that marinara sauce, Bob; I'll start by washing the tomatoes!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "After we finish the marinara, let's move on to hand-stretching the pizza dough; I can show some techniques for getting it perfectly thin and even.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'm done washing these ripe tomatoes; should I start chopping them up for the marinara sauce?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Yes, go ahead and chop those tomatoes, and we'll start simmering them with the garlic and herbs for the marinara.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "The tomatoes are all chopped; how much garlic should I add to the marinara?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Add about four cloves of garlic for a rich flavor, but feel free to adjust to your taste.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Four cloves it is; I'm adding them to the sauce now!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Fantastic, Alice; once the garlic is in, let's add a handful of freshly picked basil leaves to the sauce to give it that aromatic kick.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've added the garlic and basil—should we let it simmer and start on the dough now?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Yes, let the sauce simmer on low heat; in the meantime, we can focus on the pizza dough and keep an eye on the sauce.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Dough time—shall I start mixing the flour and yeast while you keep an eye on the marinara?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Yes, starting with the flour and yeast is perfect, Alice; let's use a ratio of three cups of flour to one packet of yeast for the dough.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Should I add olive oil to the yeast mixture or will you do that while I mix the flour?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, I'll pour a tablespoon of olive oil into the yeast mixture while you start combining it with the flour.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've added the oil, so now I’ll start mixing the flour and yeast together!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, that's perfect; now let's slowly add water to the mix until we get a smooth and elastic dough consistency.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "The dough's coming along nicely; shall we start prepping toppings while it rises?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, while the dough rises, I'll start slicing the mozzarella and picking basil leaves for the toppings; can you get the olives and any other toppings you'd like?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll gather the olives and how about adding some mushrooms too, if we have them?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Adding mushrooms sounds great, I'll see if we have them and start prepping them for the topping.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "I found some mushrooms in the fridge; should I slice them or leave them whole for the pizza topping?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Slice the mushrooms thinly; they'll cook evenly and absorb the flavors of our fresh marinara beautifully.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Thin slices of mushrooms are done; how's the dough looking, Bob, ready for toppings?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "The dough is perfectly risen and ready for the toppings; let's start assembling the pizza!",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about enjoying the meal",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, let's sprinkle these thinly sliced mushrooms and tear some fresh basil over the top before it goes into the oven.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, the basil tearing looks perfect; let's pop this pizza in the oven and set the table while we wait.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Everything looks delicious; after we enjoy the pizza and gelato, how about sharing our favorite parts of cooking together tonight?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The flavors have really come together beautifully, and the freshness of the herbs makes all the difference, doesn't it?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Absolutely, the freshness of the herbs paired with the creaminess of the mozzarella made for an unforgettable pizza, and this coconut milk gelato is a true delight, especially with those chocolate shavings we added!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about reflection and farewell",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "What are everyone's thoughts on hosting a tech-themed cooking night next time, maybe even livestream it for fun?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Cooking together was a blast; what do you guys think about teaming up again next weekend for a sushi-making challenge?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  }
]","fileTypeName":"JSON","fileType":"text/json","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/JSON_Data.png","key":416,"location":"26340 -4620","doCompute":"DataFlow_DataSend"},
{"label":"History","category":"DataFlow_DataSend","size":"240 80","buttons_":[{"name":"Restore","checked":false}],"in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a JSON object or array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a JSON object or array"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"[
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about introductions and setting the mood",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "How do you feel about a Mediterranean theme for tonight's meal, with some refreshing mocktails to set the mood?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I think a Mediterranean theme sounds delightful; I could whip up some homemade focaccia with garden-fresh herbs – how does that sound to everyone?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "(silence)",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Focaccia sounds amazing, Bob; maybe I can contribute by making a batch of lemon olive oil cupcakes to keep with the Mediterranean vibe!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, those lemon olive oil cupcakes sound perfect; how about we also have some light Greek salads with a variety of olives and feta for balance?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "How about setting up a playlist with some Mediterranean tunes to enhance our cooking atmosphere?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Let's each pick a Mediterranean country as inspiration for our dishes, ensuring a delightful spread without any conflicting flavors.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'm thinking of making a chocolate-dipped fruit assortment; who's up for a sweet yet light Mediterranean dessert?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Chocolate-dipped fruit sounds splendid, Alice; shall we decide on who takes which country for their dish to add variety to our Mediterranean feast?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "How enjoyable, let's assign countries now; I'll start with Italy for my chocolate-dipped fruits, avoiding any spicy toppings of course.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll tackle Spain for our Mediterranean feast—how does a savory paella with a blend of seasonal vegetables and tempeh sound for the main course?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Paella is a splendid choice, Alex; I'll complement it with an assortment of Italian antipasti, ensuring we cater to any non-spicy food lovers.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Looking forward to our Mediterranean soirée; has anyone specific dietary preferences or restrictions we should be aware of as we plan our menu?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Perhaps we could each share if there are any foods we need to avoid to ensure a delightful evening for all.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Shall we begin our culinary adventure at 6 PM and does anyone require vegetarian or gluten-free options?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "The focaccia and antipasti are vegetarian, and I'll make sure to exclude gluten from at least one dish for those with sensitivities—any other dietary needs we should consider?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll also prepare a velvety hummus dip with crudité for anyone who prefers a gluten-free option, and I'm really looking forward to the warmth and fellowship of cooking together!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about recipe selection",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Noticing we've all chosen our countries and dishes, I think a Spanish-style almond and orange blossom cake would complement our Mediterranean spread and respect everyone's dietary preferences—is that agreeable?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about ingredient check",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'll check my garden for fresh herbs and ensure we have all the necessary ingredients—does anyone need to flag any potential allergens?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, Alice, could you both double-check your recipes and let me know if there's anything you need me to pick up for the evening?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex, could you grab some dark chocolate and almonds for my dessert and maybe some extra oranges for your cake?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Before we dive in, do we all have the main components for our dishes or are there any specific ingredients anyone still needs?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "I've checked my pantry, and I'm all set with everything needed for my chocolate-dipped fruits and the hummus; are we all good on our end?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "(silence)",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Can you also pick up some chickpeas for my hummus, as I've just realized I'm running low?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, I'll grab some chickpeas and the other items you requested; Bob, any ingredients you need me to pick up?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "(silence)",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex, could you please pick up some extra virgin olive oil and rosemary; I've just noticed I'm short on those for the focaccia and antipasti?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, got it—I'll pick up the olive oil and rosemary, anything else you need or should I also bring some non-gluten flour for the focaccia?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "No need for non-gluten flour, Alex, I've got that covered, but could you bring some capers and anchovies for the antipasti?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "I'm heading out to grab the dark chocolate, almonds, oranges, chickpeas, extra virgin olive oil, rosemary, capers, and anchovies—any last-minute additions before I leave?",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Could you also please pick up some fresh basil and parsley for the antipasti and focaccia garnish?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alex"
  },
  {
    "text": "Just a quick update: I've got all the requested ingredients plus the fresh basil and parsley, see you all at 6 PM ready for our Mediterranean cooking adventure!",
    "sender": "Alex",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about preparation and cooking",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alex's cake and Alice's desserts sound divine; as for my part, I'll start with the focaccia dough to have it ready for a timely rise.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Can I help you with the preparation of the antipasti or would you like me to start with the hummus and desserts?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, why don't you start with the hummus and desserts, and I'll call you over when it's time to garnish the focaccia and assemble the antipasti.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, I'll get started on the hummus and then move on to the chocolate-dipped fruits—do you need any specific designs drawn on the focaccia before it bakes?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, a simple criss-cross pattern on the focaccia would be lovely, thank you for offering!",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, I'll make the criss-cross pattern on the focaccia now, would you like me to add any herbs or olives on top before it bakes?",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, sprinkling some rosemary and garlic with a few kalamata olives on top would be perfect, let's do that before it goes into the oven.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, I'll gently press the rosemary and garlic into the dough, add the olives, and then let's get it into the oven for baking.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, the rosemary and garlic are great, and once the focaccia is in the oven, I’ll start on the antipasti assembly—maybe you could help me with slicing after you finish the desserts?",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, once the focaccia's in the oven, I'll help you slice the ingredients for the antipasti.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, that sounds great; after the focaccia's in, I'll start slicing the veggies and cheeses for the antipasti, then could use your artistic touch for the plating.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Bob, I'm finishing up the desserts now and I'll be right over to assist with the antipasti plating.",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "Bob"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about enjoying the meal",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "Alice, the plating is looking marvelous; let's sit down, savor our creations, and share what we've each enjoyed most about the cooking process.",
    "sender": "Bob",
    "receiver": "Alice"
  },
  {
    "text": "Lets change our topic and discuss about reflection and farewell",
    "sender": "_Goal",
    "receiver": "All"
  },
  {
    "text": "This culinary journey was incredible, I can't wait to exchange more recipes and maybe have a soccer game before our next cookout!",
    "sender": "Alice",
    "receiver": "All"
  }

{"label":"Stop Gate","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"reset","name":"reset"},{"portId":"in","name":"in"},{"portId":"trigger","name":"trigger"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"isPropagateOnTrigger","value":"false","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

const isPropagateOnTrigger = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'isPropagateOnTrigger', true );
if( name == 'reset' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', false );
} else if( name == 'in' ) {
  const isTriggerReceived = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', false );
  if( !isTriggerReceived && !isPropagateOnTrigger ) {
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', value );
  }
} else if( name == 'trigger' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'isTriggerReceived', true );
  const outValue = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'in', null );
  if( isPropagateOnTrigger ) {
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
  }
}","fileTypeName":"Gate","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":481,"location":"7310.5 -6629.945","editorPosition":[1388,814,735,342],"group":584},

"doCompute" call in the component","value":"identity","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'doCompute' ) {
  const identity = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'identity', {} );
  const currentStepInfo = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'currentStepInfo', {} );
  const traits = currentStepInfo['identity traits'];
  
  const outValue = {};
  if( traits ) {
    traits.forEach( (t)=> outValue[t] = identity[t] );
  }
  graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
}","fileTypeName":"Component","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":497,"location":"1860.5 -6359.945","group":503},
{"label":"AI template","category":"DataFlow_Template","size":"240 190","color":"Moccasin","in_":[{"portId":"agentName","name":"agentName"},{"portId":"currentIdentity","name":"currentIdentity"},{"portId":"situation","name":"situation"},{"portId":"currentStepInfo","name":"currentStepInfo"},{"portId":"factList","name":"factList"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"agentName","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"matcher","value":"{[^}]+}"},{"name":"other1","value":"Alice","valueChanged":true},{"name":"other2","value":"Bob","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"This is the history of conversation until now
from the oldest to the earliest turns (empty at start):
{factList}

Take the role of an agent named {agentName}. 
your personality traits are defined in the 
following JSON:
{currentIdentity}

You are in the following situation:
{situation}

Your goal is defined in the following JSON
by the fields "goal" and "discussion":
{currentStepInfo}

Nevertheless the goal is abstract and defined in meta-terms.
You have to convert this goal in concrete action and concrete
proposals rooted in reality.
Give the most probable reaction of {agentName} to the 
current conversation by considering the goal but also 
by answering questions raised during the conversation.
Produce a single sentence with {agentName} as a sender. 
Your answer must be in the following format 
using one and only one of the following options:
a) if you want to say something to All: 
   [{agentName} -> All] <your sentence, question or answer>
b) if you want to ask something to Alex:
   [{agentName} -> {other1}] <your question or answer to Alex>
c) if you want to ask something to Bob:
   [{agentName} -> {other2}] <your question or answer to Bob>
   
To produce the most probable answer to the discussion 
you must respect the following rules.
1) Be extremely concise, use a single sentence.
2) Be casual and avoid formalities and never repeat "thanks".
4) Do not repeat any information already present in 
the history of the discussion said by you or others.
5) Be concrete in the proposal you make.
6) Answer questions immediately and never repeat the question. 
or example you can approve a suggestion or propose 
something else. Important is to have every question 
answered immediately to progress with the dialog.
7) Formulate the actions you do so that the other 
participants can be informed.
8) Try to reach the goal as quick as possible.","fileTypeName":"Template","doCompute":"DataFlow_Template","key":498,"location":"2662.3960000000006 -6338.744999999999","editorPosition":[3264,48,528,576],"group":503},

[Bob -> All] okay

[Bob -> Alice] it's okay okay

{"label":"Convert Assistant to Chat","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"sender","name":"sender"},{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"defaultSender","value":"Alex","unit":"","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'in' ) {
  let outValue = {};
  const defaultSender = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'defaultSender', '' );
  let sender = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'sender', defaultSender );
  const match = value.match( /\[(?<sender>\w+)\s+\->\s+(?<receiver>\w+)\]\s+(?<text>.*)/ );
  if( match ) {
    const item = match.groups;
    sender = sender || item.sender;
    outValue = { sender, receiver: item.receiver, text: item.text, isFiller: false };
  } else {
    outValue = { sender, receiver: 'All', text: value, isFiller: false };
  }
  graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
}

{"label":"Use this graph to configure:
1) The identity of the agents by defining the node "agent specification" for each agent
2) Press the related "start" button for the defined agents => then a new set of identities will be generated in the relate DB
3) By defining the node "scenario specification" with the wanted scenario
4) Press the related "start" button for the scenario => a new scenario will be generated in the DB","category":"TextLabels_Size2","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0","size":"1890 180","key":507,"location":"12770 -100"},
{"label":"High-Level System Design Graph","category":"TextLabels_Size4","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0","size":"1160 100","key":510,"location":"16120 -4640"},
{"label":"This graph represent the overall system design of the full system. It models the main parts of the system:
1) Goal Selection: the system here decides to select one of the available high-level goals, for which it will work on
2) Goal Specification: the system analyse the goal by generating a more detail set of sub-goals into a goal specification. Here some more information necessary to work on the goal are generated
3) Work Package Definition: the system here brakes the goal into the definition of a synopsis (used as master plan for the moderator), a team specification (decide on team members, skill and profile) and on a set of KPI necessary for the evaluation of the work
4) Work Package Execution: here the full team (moderator, agents and evaluators) works on the work package
5) Summary and Results: here a summary and a result report is generated","category":"TextLabels_Size2","alignment":"0 0.5 0 0","alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0","size":"1890 180","key":511,"location":"16120 -4420"},

{"label":"filler specification","category":"DataFlow_Data","size":"240 80","in_":[{"portId":"in","name":"in","tooltip":"this input expects a string"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"this output is a string"}],"props_":[],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"Please create a list of short filler text that
can be used as the start a sentence before the
speaker knows exactly what he wants to say. 
Please include filler that contains words or 
sounds.
The filler should be defined in a JSON format
following this example:

{
  "waiting": [ "Um, well...", 
              "Let me see...", 
              "Oh, right...", 
              "I mean, you know...", 
              "Uh, let me think...", 
              "Give me a moment...", 
              "Actually..." ],
  "recalling": [ "Oh, I remember now...", 
                 "I just remembered...", 
                 "It just came back to me..." ],
  "confirming": [ "You know, like...",
                 "So, I was thinking...",
                 "Hmm, okay...",
                 "Uh, it's like this...",
                 "Well, you see...",
                 "So, here's the thing..." ],
  ...
}

Please use many different categories like:

  "waiting", "recalling", "confirming", 
  "clarifying", "hesitating", "redirecting"
  
and others you find relevant. 
Please generate many fillers per category
(particularly for the "waiting" category)","fileTypeName":"Text","fileType":"text/text","iconURL":"/fileServer/pictures/Text_Data.png","doCompute":"DataFlow_Data","key":525,"location":"13000.00024061304 1854.539104354356","group":521},

{"label":"push item in array","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"array","name":"array","tooltip":"JSON array where to push data"},{"portId":"item","name":"item","tooltip":"JSON item to be pushed in array"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"JSON array containing pushed item"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"item","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'item' ) {
  const database = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'array', [] );
  try {
    const newData = JSON.parse( value, null, 2 );
    database.push( newData );
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', database );
  } catch( e ) {
    console.warn( 'Not well formatted JSON' );
  } 
}","fileTypeName":"PushInArray","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":527,"location":"14220.00024061304 1834.4391043543565","group":521},

{"label":"select item in array","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"240 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"onSelect","name":"onSelect","tooltip":"Event that triggers the firing of out"},{"portId":"index","name":"index","tooltip":"If connected, index of element 
in array starting with 0"},{"portId":"array","name":"array","tooltip":"JSON array from where to select an item"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out","tooltip":"Selected element from the array"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"array","tooltip":"this property defines the AND combination of 
input names that will trigger an 
"doCompute" call in the component","valueChanged":"true"},{"name":"index","value":"0","unit":"","valueChanged":"true","tooltip":"Index of selected element from the array
if the index input is not connected
otherwise the input has priority"},{"name":"isIndexRandom","value":"false","unit":"","valueChanged":"true","tooltip":"If true the index of the selected element
is defined randomly.
Also if an input is connected"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

if( name == 'doCompute' ) {
  const database = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'array', [] );
  const indexInput = graphData.dfe.getInput( nodeData, 'index', -1 );
  const dblen = database.length;
  
  if( dblen > 0 ) {
    
    const isIndexRandom = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'isIndexRandom', false );
    let index = graphData.dfe.getProperty( nodeData, 'index', 0 );
    index = ( indexInput == -1 )? index: indexInput;
    
    if( isIndexRandom ) {
      index = Math.floor( Math.random()*dblen );
    }
    
    index = Math.min( dblen-1, Math.max( 0, index ) );
    const outValue = database[index];
    
    graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );

{"label":"Concatenate Text in  JSON Message","category":"DataFlow_Component","size":"290 80","color":"LightSeaGreen","in_":[{"portId":"doClean","name":"doClean"},{"portId":"in","name":"in"}],"out_":[{"portId":"out","name":"out"}],"props_":[{"name":"computeBarrier","value":"","unit":"","valueChanged":"true"}],"isFile":true,"fileContent":"var nodeData, name, value;

const emptyMessage = {
  sender: '',
  receiver: '',
  text: '',
};
  
// Update input values
if( name == 'doClean' ) {
  graphData.dfe.set( nodeData, 'message', emptyMessage );
} else if( name == 'in' ) {
  const outValue = graphData.dfe.get( nodeData, 'message', emptyMessage );
  outValue.sender = value.sender;
  outValue.receiver = value.receiver;
  outValue.text = outValue.text+' '+value.text;
  graphData.dfe.fireOutput( nodeData, 'out', outValue );
}","fileTypeName":"Component","fileType":"text/javascript","iconURL":"","key":675,"location":"6030.5 -6719.945","editorPosition":[939,656,461,256],"group":748},
